brand_info.name: Nike
brand_info.positioning: Athlete-led performance innovation and sport-inspired lifestyle products for the athlete in everyone.
brand_info.vision: Do everything possible to expand human potential.
brand_info.mission: To bring inspiration and innovation to every athlete* in the world. *If you have a body, you are an athlete.
brand_info.origin_story: Founded on January 25, 1964 by Bill Bowerman and Phil Knight as Blue Ribbon Sports; the company became Nike, Inc. in 1971, named after the Greek goddess of victory.

brand_values.brand_promise: Innovative product and storytelling that enables performance, confidence, and progress through sport.
differentiators: Iconic brand codes (Swoosh, Just Do It) with culture-scale storytelling

psychographics.lifestyle: Active, sport-adjacent, and culture-driven consumers who value progress, self-improvement, and expressive style.
psychographics.behavior: Engages with sport, training, and street culture; responds to athlete proof, clear benefits, and emotionally charged motivation.

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Short, imperative, action-oriented statements supported by athlete proof and clear benefits.
preferred_structures: Minimal copy paired with strong visuals
tone_donts: Excessive claims without visual or athlete context

logo.primary_logo: Swoosh with NIKE wordmark (as applicable by asset system)
logo.usage_rules: High contrast, clean placement, and consistent clear space; never distort, add effects, or integrate into patterns.
logo.lockup_behavior: Corner placement or centered end-frame lockup depending on channel; maintain consistent scale relative to format.
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals at least the height of the Swoosh around the mark.

color_system.color_usage_rules: Prefer stark black/white; use limited accent colors for energy or category codes; avoid decorative gradients unless part of campaign art direction.

typography.primary_font: Bold condensed sans-serif (Nike platform typography family equivalents per channel)
typography.secondary_font: Neutral sans-serif for body and UI

layout_principles.grid_system: Simple modular grid; strong alignment to edges and safe areas
layout_principles.white_space_ratio: Controlled to minimal, strategic negative space for impact and legibility
layout_principles.cta_placement: Lower third or corner, aligned to grid; keep CTA concise
layout_principles.alignment: High discipline; strong left or right alignment, with occasional centered hero layouts

style.camera_feel: Dynamic, close-to-action perspective with decisive framing and strong subject presence.
style.pose_guidelines: Athletic intent, tension, and purpose; movement captured at peak moment or pre-action focus.
style.casting_attitude: Competitive, focused, self-possessed; inclusive casting across sports, body types, and abilities.

technical.lighting: High-contrast studio or directional natural light; night sport lighting when relevant
technical.grain: Clean digital or subtle texture, campaign-dependent
technical.depth_of_field: Shallow to medium; subject separation prioritized
technical.color_grading: Neutral base with controlled saturation; black-and-white used for iconic impact

model_casting.diversity: Yes, explicit and broad across sport, culture, and ability

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Product clearly legible in use or close-up; benefits implied through action and detail.
product_presentation.styling_approach: Sport-functional, performance credible, minimal accessories; street styling when lifestyle-led.
avoid: Cluttered backgrounds that reduce product clarity

motion_rules.pacing: Fast cuts with rhythmic build; occasional slow-motion for peak moments
motion_rules.transitions: Hard cuts, whip transitions, typography punches, and end-frame lockups

visual_dos: Use tight crops on faces, hands, and product detail
Maintain strong contrast and clean brand marks
visual_donts: Decorative overlays that compete with the Swoosh
copy_dos: Let the visual carry the message

retail.soundscape: Up-tempo sport-forward playlists with rhythmic energy

digital.tone_adjustment: More concise and punchy on social; slightly more explanatory on product pages.

platform_behavior.Instagram: Short-form kinetic edits, bold typography moments, athlete close-ups
platform_behavior.Website: Benefit-led product storytelling with strong visuals and clean UI
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Direct headlines, strong hero image, minimal sections

print.paper: Coated or uncoated stock depending on category; high-contrast reproduction prioritized
print.cover_rules: Full-bleed hero with minimal copy; Swoosh lockup placed with disciplined clear space

logo_misuse_examples: Swoosh used as a pattern fill
Drop shadows or glow effects on the mark
